medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports 3 days of nearly constant epigastric pain, which has not been exacerbated by PO intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, auto-immune pancreatitis with distal common bile duct stricture, impaired glucose tolerance secondary to prednisone, RUL nodule stable on imaging, history of treatment for latent TB.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of old age, mother alive at age >___, all brothers and sisters healthy.
